content.detailedDescription: Around 8 pm, i was laying in my pool and looking strait up and saw an object very high in the sky that was simular to venus, except bigger and brighter than venus. venus was just barely visable at this time about 45 degrees above the horizon to the west (as it has been for about the past month at sunset). quickly checked the object out with binoculars, and it did not look like a planet or star. then looked at the object with a x78 power telescope, and the object looked like a mostly clear reflective soap bubble with a swinging line attached at the bottom with some sort of reflective object swinging wildly at the end of the line. tried to get pictures/video with my x40 power sony videocam, but it could not pick up the swinging line with the dangling object attached due to its extreme high altitude(which was likely in the 100,000 feet range). my guess was that it was a weather balloon with instruments attached (at first). however, i kept watching it for about 20 minutes, until it just vanished against the clear blue sky. i had a good visual on it, and it just disappeared. i had attempted to record the object from a tripod, but was unable to adjust the tripod to a nearly straight up angle. this makes about 12 sightings at this location in the past five years of high altitude stationary objects that just vanish into the clear blue sky!
content.summary: It may have been a weather balloon, but...

content.detailedDescription:
I stopped my bike at the n.E. corner of como lake in st paul , mn. i looked up to see an orange light approaching from the south. i thought plane maybe but i heard no sound, so a helicopter with spotlight but there was no light beam. it flew over the lake and right over my head, maybe 150-200 hundred feet up.

it seemed to be flame on the bottom of something, i could only make out one small black dot on one side of this object actualy a rod with a ball on it to the front . a jogger who was passing by said, what is that thing? i said ufo but he continued running away. plasma like fire was in a circle on the bottom .

after it passed over very slowly it left to the north at great speed, less than a second to be out of sight! this all lasted maybe two minutes. a young man maybe 17 or 18 y.O. asked me if i had seen this object and he was very happy when i told him i had .

i had my iphone in hand but but for some weird reason just didn't take any photo or video.
slightly above the treetops.
 
it just moved along so slowly it was amazing it could stay airborne at roughly 30-35 mph , i could feel something in the air i just can't describe .

it just vanished by victoria st. and larpentuer ave. , strange because the new water res under construction looks disc like on google earth .


i'm including my original notes & sketches .
  
this has deeply affected me just not sure how yet , way beyond anything i've ever seen outside a theater or movie , on my way to college that's for sure!!!!!
content.summary: Triangle craft over como lake circle with plasma like fire on bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was on the first leg of a flight from denver, co to charleston, sc before it made a stop in nashville, tn (i was on the den to bna leg). the flight took off at 9:25am mst. the pictures i took on my phone had time stamps from 3:07pm to 3:08pm. i do not believe these times to be correct because the flight was scheduled to land in charleston, sc at 3:45pm est. i was staring out the window, as i do on long boring flights and i noticed a long black cylinder like object directly off the left side of the 737 aircraft i was in. i fly often and know what other aircraft looks like outside of a plane window. this object was odd because it had no trail and it kept up with the plane i was in, before changing directions completely and speeding up to go in the opposite direction. at first the object was almost vertical and then it moved to become more level (see attached images).  i pointed the object out to my friend who was traveling with me and he could not explain it either. i felt like the object was observing the plane i was in and then lost interest and went on its way. i lost sight of it when it changed directions and sped away from our plane. i have attached images of the object that i captured with my iphone 4.
content.summary: Long black tube ufo flew parallel to plane i was in for 2 minutes then changed direction

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from the park on a monday night, roughly 9.30 - 10pm.  i spotted a strange light, at first i thought it was a star but it began to flash which made me think it was a plane.  then the flashing kept changing randomly from very fast to very slow.  the object was making sharp turns and looked like it was floating and wasn't moving very fast.  i watched it for a few minutes then it moved east out over the north sea.  i continued home and when i was looking out over the river tay to the south towards leuchars air base where i saw another light which flashed it made a few turns then headed out east.
content.summary: Flashing light making random changes in flight path.  frequency of flash changed often.  another light spotted to south near raf base.

content.detailedDescription: I was babysitting with my  17 year old daughter. the girls we were babysitting  were all very young. we went outside to play in the backyard. my daughter noticed the object first. it had no shape. it changed shape often but did not  fly away with the wind. i could not explain this object. it seemed to be floating  slowly. when i looked very carefully i could see  small white objects  around it.  looking at this object strained my eyes a bit. we even left the backyard for awhile and went inside because it just  sort of hung there in the sky. i had no explanation to give. i went back outside and it was much smaller because it was moving away from us.  i tried to use the lil kids binocular to see it closer. i remember it being a  light orange color.  finally it disappeared from sight. i tried to google it to see if anyone else noticed the object but could not find any information about. i almost forgot to report this.
content.summary: Strange object that changed shape. squinting my eyes i saw  smaller white objects around it.

content.detailedDescription: On the 11th of august i was in my front yard looking at the stars. i was facing north and to the west a bright white orb,sphere just appeared. it was real bright thats why i noticed it. no noise came from it when it moved threw the sky about the speed of a plane and was definitely lower in altitude than a plane. it was travel in to the east about 45' in the sky. so i took my camera on my phone and turned the flash to its highest and point it and captured two pictures.Then it went out of sight due to horizon. i don't know what it is but i do know i have seen similar thing(s) for the past 2years off and on. i was super excited when i seen it and really excited when i took the pictures. but when i got inside much later and looked at my pictures i was in shock in what was got in both photos. to me i think they are 2 of the best pictures of a ufo i have ever seen and people i show say and believe the same.
content.summary: Outside looking nortj and to the wrst bright light apperead low in sky when to tje east until out of sight

content.detailedDescription: i was on the amtrak train, the train had just entered chicago so being the tourist i am i took a photo of the willis (or sears) tower. i had not seen anything at the time it took the picture. i was still on the train at the time, i took the picture through the window. the window had a smear on it, if you look at the picture the ufo looks like its emitting smoke, it's not, it's the smear. when i noticed it on my picture the first thing that came to mind was "i actually caught a legit ufo, and i'm only 12".
content.summary: I took a picture of the willis tower, from a train. i did not see it until a week later

content.detailedDescription: Hello i am searching for an answer as to yesterday august 20, 2013 at around 9:30pm heading east on pandora street me and my wife were driving home and staring amazingly to the moon that was a very bright yellow, arguing if the moon was a full moon. while staring at the moon we both at the same time could not believe our eyes on what we saw......So the moon was big bright yellow and on its left side of the moon we seen a very clear black ovalish(longwise) circular object appear and then quickly exit the same direction did not cross the moon looked like as if someone pointed a lazer to it and was playing with us .. can some one give us a explanation pls
content.summary: Aug.20 full moon observing when me and wife see black object appear over moon then vanish back wards fast dark black super  clear

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting outside on the back porch of my brother's house and she asked me, "what is that in the sky over there?" and pointed towards the west. i looked and at this point there was an orange glowing sphere in the distance flying straight up from the horizon. at first it made me think that it was a rocket ship taking off in a far distance but there wasn't a trail behind it and we do not live beside any government or privately owned space centers that i know of. my girlfriend is beyond excited, yelling "what is it? what is it?" and i do not respond out of disbelief of my eyes. moving slowly, it eventually turns into an oblong teardrop shape. we both watched as it ascended into the sky and eventually disappeared.
content.summary: Flaming ball of light appeared over treeline slowly ascending and eventually turned into an oblong like shape and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Please just contact me right away i have 4eccelent pics  and ive tryed to fill out this form3times and get to theend and loose it some one needs to see this
content.summary: Dark circle lite up arund it. i have very good pics didgital

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting around the campfire. i looked up into the night sky and noticed a strange orange glowing object moving steadily across the sky, parallel to the ground. from where we were sitting it appeared to be half the size of the moon, but obviously much closer. it was dark so we couldn't judge how high it was in relation to where we were sitting. it moved silently and it didn't have a tail or leave a trail. we watched it for as long as we could before it disappeared behind trees far on the horizon. we sat calmly for the entire sighting. we agreed it was much too slow for a meteor (plus it didn't leave a trail), much too slow for a falling star (plus it didn't fall or diminish in intensity), too round and bulky for a plane, and, unlike a chinese lantern, it moved exactly parallel to the ground in a straight line for many kilometres until it disappeared from our view. we both agreed it was unlike anything we'd ever seen before.
content.summary: Orange glowing object moved across the sky at a steady pace. it made no sound and had no tail.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the front porch and noticed 2 bright lights in the sky to the south. they hovered and changed directions going back and forth. then they would change from green to red and drop like a rock behind the treeline. this was about 2 weeks before i made this report. i was told they may have been helios helicopters. i didn't notice them again until last night, they were in the same location and doing the same thing as before, changing color and dropping out of sight and back up again. tonight they appeared at the same time around 9:15pm. i drove to a better location to observe them and a couple of more people were watching them. a lady said that it flew right over them just before i arrived and was in the shape of an asterisk with a spinning motion in the center, she said it made a slight humming noise like an air conditioning unit. we watched the lights hover, float around make hairpin turns and come to a complete stop. one of the objects changed colors from a green and white light to a brilliant red and dropped like a rock behind the treeline. the other one remained in the air and floated around then stop and hover. a few minutes passed and the object that dropped behind the treeline reappeared rising back up in a brilliant red light..Then the object went from red to a blinding white light. we watched the objects and we had a really freaky feeling watching them. then both objects turned red and dropped behind the treeline and we didn't see them again. the other couple said they came to the same location last night and watched the same thing, they appear at the same time at night and the event last a good 45 minutes. they said that when they both dropped behind the trees you don't see them again. not sure if they are landing but the one goes down while the other stays up and hovers and floats nearby.  both objects dropped below the tree line. we stayed around but didn't see the objects again. if a mufon investigator can contact me i will send him directions..I have a feeling they will be back again tomorrow evening.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright lights in the sky, change for red to green and white..Drops like a rock

content.detailedDescription:
I was emptying out a cooler on the back deck, when i raised up, i saw the light in the sky above a nearby hill.  the sky was grey with some stars visible, but this was super bright.  at first i thought it was a helicopter hovering, so i went back inside and came back out about five minutes later.  it was still there.

i called my daughter in cleveland, ohio to tell her i was pretty sure i was seeing a ufo.  while talking to her a few minutes and watching the object, it very gradually moved a little to my right, so that i had to re-position myself to look through the tree on the hill.  i then went back in the house to put on my shoes and go out the door at the end of the house so i could see the object better.

the object was still hovering in the same general area but again started to very gradually moved away from me and back over the "horizon" of the hill.

i could see intermittent changes of color that appeared to be revolving around the bright light. these were red and blue or green and created very thin light streaks from the object.

though skeptical of the stories i have read and heard of many "ufo" sightings, i do believe we are not alone in this world.  the prospect of seeing a real ufo and aliens was exciting and scary at the same time.  my fiance is in bristol, tn tonight on business, so i was alone.  that's part of the reason i called my daughter - it was a bit freaky being alone.  i also wanted corroboration after the fact that i had seen this object, and i know she would love to see one too.
content.summary: Very bright light with colored beams hovering

content.detailedDescription: Right before sunset on the ne side of tucson around 7:00pm i was on my back porch. i observed a large black square object that appeared to be between 200-500 ft in altitude traveling nw to se. at first i thought there was a bright light on the bottom. when the sun set, i realized it was reflecting the setting sun on the bottom. after the sun set a few seconds later the object was completely black. there was enough light left to make it out. i could not judge the size but i would guess it was at least 20ft square or larger. it made no noise. there was no wind, if it was emitting any noise i'm sure i would have heard it. about a mile or so from my home it turned due south and seemed to be descending. i lost sight of it when it turned south due to obstructions of my view. i immediately checked news reports online and found nothing on it. i have never seen an object like it, nor any flying object i could not identify.....Ever.
content.summary: Large black square, reflected setting sun on bottom then all black when sun set

content.detailedDescription: On friday, august 9th 2013 , between 8pm and 9pm , (best estimate is 8:30pm as it was right around sunset) my family and i were walking back from the beach to our hotel room on jekyll island , georgia. my nephew's mother stopped me as we were walking and asked what is that in the sky? i glanced up real quick and saw a couple of lights close to eachother& parallel & i said it's a helicopter and kept walking. she then said, "but it's not moving".My mom, her and i then stared up at it. not only was it not moving, lights were not flashing & it made no noise.  i saw 2 circular lights hover. they were larger than any star and glowed/pulsed a orangish/white light. one by one the lights dissappeared from the outside towards the center. there may have been a third light that had disappeared because my mom thought she saw 3 at first. it all happened very quick,within 30 seconds or so.
content.summary: On jekyll island, georgia, on august 9th 2013 around 8:30pm i witnessed 2 orangish/white lights hover over ocean then disappear one by one from outside towards center.

content.detailedDescription: Heard jets flying low, went outside to watch them. after 3-5 mins. we noticed two other objects slightly higher in the sky. one didnt seem to move at all, the other moved slowly to the south. then, as we watched, i looked through field binoculars for a sort time, one began to move up. it picked up seep as it did this. faster and faster it moved until it disappeared. the other object began to move off to the north, slowly.It seemed to leave eye view within a few mins. we live close to wright patterson airforce base, so we see jets a couple times a month. seemed strange that the jets and these objects were in the sky at the same time.The time would have been around 10:30pm. at first the objects in question seemed to be very bright stars.
content.summary: Heard jets fly over home, watched them, then noticed two other stationary objects above..After 3-5 mins one began to move slowly..One moved slowly, the other stayed stationary

content.detailedDescription: On april 16, 2012 at 21:06 (9:06 pm), i stepped out my front door to take out the trash.It had been raining to some degree for the past day or two, and the rain had finally let up, with very low thick rain clouds covering the entire area. as i stepped on my front porch, i observed what i thought was a very low commercial jet with its landing lights on about a mile away directly to the west. on the way back into the house, i observed the object still due west, and very slowly moving south, well below the very low thick rain clouds. i stopped and observed the object for about 20 seconds and noted that it appeared to be pulsating and moving too slow to be a plane, plus there was no noise coming from that direction. i immediately ran into the house and grabbed my binoculars and sony handicam. i first looked through my binoculars and observed the most beautiful object that i have ever seen which consisted of a perfectly round white ball of light (or energy)that was closely shrouded by a blue colored field that appeared to be electrical in nature. in addition, the white ball center was being orbited systematically by what appeared to be smaller red balls of energy that appeared to be some type of plasma. the systemactic movement of the red orbs around the main white center neuculus reminded me of the rapid timed movements of a engines pistons firing in secquence. surrounding the large white center neuculus, orbiting red orbs, and blue electical field; were a perfect ring of rose colored neon like lights blinking around the far outer perfect circle surrounding all the inter workings of the object. this gave me the impression that this was an outer ring of the same very large object, although no structure or lights could be seen between the center orb and the rose colored ring of lights circling around the center a great distance to the outside. after observing this with my binoculars, and catching my breath, i began videotaping the object as it slowly moved between two trees in the distance. object was believed to be about 500 feet off the ground and over a mile away to the west. object was huge! the video showed the object go behind a tree in the distance, then the object appeared to shoot straight up into space with a flash from behind the tree. (a blast of static was recorded on my video when the object blasted up into space in a flash, even though the volume was turned off on the camcorder). i watched the video about 50 times and my neighbor about a dozen times, before the video was loss likely from a defective dvd disc. (still have the disc if someone knows how to retreive the video off of it?).I did save still shots of the video to my cellphone, but can not attach them here, but i can email them if needed. i drove to the area where the object was seen without seeing it further. i did note that high voltage power lines were in the area that the object was observed.
content.summary: Object appeared to be made of energy like a giant atom.

content.detailedDescription: Apx 9:45pm 8/20/13 puyallup wa.  went outside at 9:30 to photograph the moon, looked up at clear sky towards north/east of moon position and noticed a triangle of what appeared to be three bright stars. one of the points began moving in very erratic ways, up,down, circular movements, zig-zagging then returning to original position with the other two points of light.  this continued for apx 20 mins total.  we did try to video this, and are currently working on it to see if we were able to catch anything on film.  we were floored!  not only did the object continue to move on and off for over 20 mins, but the last time it "reconnected" to the other two, the entire group of three began to move south directly over us and then actually tilted and continued to move. when that occurred you could make out a "center" which looked like heat waves between the three lights as if they were attached to a craft that was someone mostly invisible.  i know how ridiculous this sounds, and i'm praying that something shows on that video.  it was huge. although i'm a believer, i have never witnessed anything like this, and was absolutely shaking after this completely went south over our house and then disappeared. i do not know what it was, and cannot make any claims other than an honest description of what my husband and i saw.  we will send anything we find on our video.  i'm hoping someone else saw this, so perhaps we aren't the only witnesses.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Apx 9:45pm 8/20/13 puyallup wa.  went outside at 9:30 to photograph the moon

content.detailedDescription:
August 20th, 2013, in the area of old carriage drive and homer watson blvd. in kitchener ontario. it was approximately 21:45, and i was driving home northwest on homer watson blvd. coming from cambridge. after passing the traffic lights at doon south drive i noticed what looked like a very slow moving glowing orange/yellow light ahead of me passing over homer watson, coming from old carriage drive. my apartment is on old carriage drive, so i have used my address in the fields above to note the location as it was extremely close by. it was barely moving at all. really just a very slow drift. it's position was roughly 30 to 35 feet above the utility poles and the object itself was also round/spherical and 30 feet in diameter. at first when i saw it i immediately thought it was a chinese lantern because of the soft glow and slow movement that you see in them, but i quickly realized the size of it and the shape was spherical. also, it did not flicker as it would from a flame. the glow was solid and did not pulsate or change at all. the object itself appeared to be solid with no features visible. i was in the left lane with a vehicle in front of me who quickly braked and i braked as well. the three vehicles in the lane to my right also braked and we all came to a stop on the road to observe this object. i did not take note of the lanes on the other side to see if anyone had stopped as i was watching the object intensely. i exited my car, along with the person in front and the person in the car to my right. i took out my cell phone to get a video as did the person in the vehicle beside mine. i could not access the camera or any other function of my phone. the person beside me said his phone was now dead and would not come back on, even though it was working just a moment ago. we observed the object for another 30 to 45 seconds. in that time it came to a brief stop (5-6 seconds) over the wooded area that lies between homer watson and mill park drive. it just hung in the air, completely motionless, the treetops were illuminated very softly. then the object resumed it's very slow pace continuing in the same direction heading north. the object's movement was slow, deliberate and did not waver or indicate that it was affected by wind. it appeared to be controlled and very smooth in its motion.

the person in the vehicle ahead of mine said he wanted to leave and was going to call the police when he got home. the person beside me said he wanted to leave now and got into his car and left, the vehicle ahead of him had already left. we did not communicate during the event except to say that our phones were not functioning. the traffic behind us had started to accumulate and cars were honking so i left and turned onto old carriage drive to head home. i turned my vehicle around to face the wooded area to see if i could still see the object but it was out of sight at this point. 

i called the police when i got into my apartment who said no one had reported any such thing and the dispatch operator didn't seem interested in my call. i called the breslau airport later that night and the person who took my call got the information from me and said that there were other calls about the same object but closer to the airport. they wouldn't provide me any other information so i ended the call. 

i can't say with any certainty what i saw, but i'll sum up the characteristics below;

- orange/yellow soft glowing light approx. 30 feet in diameter
- very slow moving, able to stop briefly then resume its course, indicating it was a controlled object and not a natural phenomenon
- completely silent
- no blinking lights or any other signals to indicate it was an            airplane or helicopter
- was approximately 70 to 90 feet above the ground

that's what i saw and i'm still puzzled today. i wasn't frightened by the event, but i did feel unsettled and still do today. it just left me feeling very strange. please feel free to contact me if you require any other details.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing object crossed over road, hovered above trees, resumed path.

content.detailedDescription:
While on our lake michigan west patio "hot air balloon" like objects travelled from north to south approximately 1-2 miles over lake michigan at an angle of about 30 degrees. there was no sound, no running/blinking lights. wind speed was 2mph, temp was 63 f with 75% humidity on a clear and cloudless night. 
three objects passed by our home, with intervals of about 1 minute,  angled west toward chicago, and then climbed rapidly to a point where they disappeared from sight. 10 minutes elapsed, and the same event happened once again.
i checked with our neighbor, a commercial pilot, and he reported he has seen the same thing, but with 4 objects flying in formation. i also checked with another neighbor, and he also observed an object.
this same event occurred at our home on the evening of july 4th 2013, but with 2 groups of 2 travelling from the south to the north with the same flight patterns.
content.summary: 2 groups of 3 ufos were observed travelling north to south, and then west, over lake michigan. when turning, they climbed and then disappeard.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk around the block where i lived, the sky was very clear so i was looking up at all the stars as i was walking and as i came around the last corner of the block i noticed a very red star in the sky, at first i thought i was an airplane.  but i wasnt moving or blinking, then i thought it might be mars but ive seen mars in the sky and this was way more red (as red and bright as a traffic light) so i stood in front of my house continuing to try to figure out what this this was and it just disappeared light the light just turned off..
content.summary: Very bright red light as bright as the north star or brighter as red as a traffic light was stationary for about 15 - 20 mins and then just dissapears and never came back

content.detailedDescription:
i was cleaning a vacant apartment on the 13th floor, ( i'm a maintenance guy for an apartment building in downtown detroit) on a sunny fall day.  

  something kept reflecting sunlight into my eyes from out side, i ignored it the first few times, figuring it was a traffic helicopter or passenger jet. after about the 5th of 6th time i was annoyed and went to the window to see what was bouncing this sunlight at me. 

   right away i could see this shiny object off in the distance, maybe a couple miles away, maybe further.  at first it seemed to be stationary, so i figured it was a helicopter. as i'm looking at it starts to head in my direction, and as it gets closer it looks less and less like a helicopter.

  it takes just a few seconds (maybe 8 seconds?) to close on my position, until finally it's only maybe 20 or 30ft outside the window i'm at on the 13th floor.  it's at my altitude, basically eye level with me, as it starts to rotate up on its side.

  i'm in awe as this is happening, not frightened, or nervous, just amazed. the first thing that caught my eye as it rotated on to its side was a small pulsing red light in the center of the underside of the craft.

  it's hard for me to explain the shape of the craft so i've included three drawings.  part of the reason it's taken me so long to make this report is because i've had a hard time getting the sketches just right.  

  i've tried to draw this thing a few dozen times and i've never been happy with the results until now.  i can say with absolute certainty that the drawings i've included are exactly what i saw. i've also included a photo i took out of the window i was standing at, i took this photo at a much later date, just as a reference to the area. 

  basically the craft is in the shape of three saucers connected together in the center, only one dome on the top, but three "pods" for lack of a better word make up the body of the craft. it seems to be a polished metal, not a mirror finish like chrome, but a reflective metal surface.

  so as it's tilting towards me i see the pulsing red light, and i see that each of the three pods has a round circular light in its center.  once the bottom of the craft is facing me the three white lights start blinking in a sequence, and the craft starts to rotate clockwise.  the blinking pattern gradually speeds up, and the rotation remains steady.

  then another set of light around the outer edge of the three white lights start flashing, only these are multi colors. there are very vibrant blues and greens and orange and yellow and purples.

  the sequence speeds up more and more until the whole thing is just a blur of lights, all the while rotating at the same steady pace.  then the lights just stopped suddenly, the craft rotated back down to it's upright position, and it hovered off to the north east around the side of my building and out of my line of sight.  

  i never saw it shoot off at tremendous speeds or anything, it just hovered away.  i ran down to the street level and searched the sky to find it again, but i never saw it again.

  i felt like the craft was trying to hypnotize me, but i don't think it worked, at least i never felt any different. 

  although i must say that since this event i've done a lot of research on ufos and the subject of abductions, and it seems most folks don't think anything other than a sighting happened to them either.  so i suppose there could be more to my story, but i remember looking at the clock after it left and i hadn't lost any time, so i'm assuming i wasn't a good candidate for abduction. 

  this is by far the strangest, most amazing thing that has ever happened to me.  even though it's been almost five years since it happened, i remember it like it was yesterday, and i'll never forget it.  it has changed my outlook on life for the better. i've made allot of positive changes in my life since my sighting and i feel blessed to have been witness to such an amazing thing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A craft flew up to me and flashed a light sequence at me, then hovered out of my line of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
29th july 2013
cambridgeshire, uk
4am - 6am gmt


multiple sightings of various ufos at close range, altitude and high altitude, taking place over two hours. 

at high altitudes on clear sky morning at sunrise there were four blurred, hazy green lights in a line formation with a fourth red light at a 90 degree angle to the lower green light. this object moved vertically up and down from position to position disturbing high altitude clouds. 

closer to the ground, no more than a mile up three smaller single green lights moved around in different directions, covering miles in seconds and returning to hover. 

much closer to the ground, hovering silently 20 - 30 feet up from the observers, two medicine ball size, dull metallic 'orbs'. both with one small green light towards the top were seen in multiple locations. from the direction of one of these two small round objects came a silver metallic 'l' shaped object (not attached but disconnected moving independently) slowly hover/move down 10 feet closer to the ground. from this l shaped object came a translucent but with red light within, eel shaped but robotic object about one foot long and 10 inches wide. it came to within feet or inches of one observer. 

in the distance, hovering no more than 20 feet above the horizon, estimated to be about 1 - 2 miles away. a large silver metallic disk with a black band running horizontally along the middle seemed to hide behind a tree line. given away by the sun reflecting on its top.

the rest of the experience is a personal subject but i think the governments of this world really have to acknowledge and do something about this level of interference from other, more advanced and perhaps megalomaniac species.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Chevron,   Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Unknown
content.summary: Too far out to go in to detail

content.detailedDescription:
I am  truck driver, whom have seen many things in the night sky, from shooting stars, to satellites, to drones and helicopters.
i was driving southbound on us 31 outside of ludington mi, while looking at the blinking red lights on the top of the windmills off to the east i glanced across to the west and noticed 4 very distinguished lights suspended in the sky, they seemed to make an arch shape, and i thought it was just a star pattern in the night sky, at this time i was north of the objects, i kept an eye on it and realized the further i drove the more the objects formed a striaght line as i was completely east looking west of the objects, the furthest one in the distance dissappeared over the horizon of what i could see, the other three remained visible,  just a solid redish orange white colored light being emitted by these objects, they just stayed in their spot, no strobe lights, no green or red id lights, no movement, as i made my way further south i was trained on the stationary lights, about 4 minutes into the sighting i watched as the closest one to me started to move southwest and did a quick jump and shot away leaving the other two visible lights behind and i watched them til i drove out of sight, i filed a report to the police of ludington, they had an officer investigate it but i received no notice on the investigation, the woman on the phone said there was a water holding facility up there with lights similar to what i was explaining to her, but i assured her i knew that this was not the holding facility, as the holding facility was 3 miles north of where i was and the objects i seen were in the sky not the ground
content.summary: 4 mysterious lights over ludington

content.detailedDescription: Walked out side onto sidewalk looked up about 30 -35 degrees towards the horizon and there was this green light going up down and side to side for about 5-6 min in the sky .. i look at the sky a lot ... and i've never seen anything like that before!! i even ade some one on the street stop to look at it to make sure i was seeming what i thought i was seeing... really cool can't stop thinking about wtf it could be... i watched it for a while then it just dropped into the tree line and i lost track of it .. crazy ...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green bright light .. went up down to the left and right .. completly not normal of any object i've ever seen in the sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was early evening. the nfl playoffs where on and it was the broncos against the ravens. i am not a fan and left a friends house in tempe when the game broadcast began. i came home to laveen and at about 6:30 pm decided to go to the end of the block to check my mail. i am only 4 houses from the end of the block where the mail boxes are and as usual i grabs my bike to ride down there. i came out of the garage and rolled to the end of the drive way and into the street. i looked north and what i saw made me drop the bike. there is a street lamp above the mail boxes and behind and above it is a tall eucalyptus tree. what i saw above and beyond the tree was a cluster of anywhere from 25 to 40 bright red lights off in the distance. my first though was christmas lights, but these where at about 40 degrees up above everything. my reaction was to pull my cell phone out and video record the lights. the street lamp below prevented that. i looked around and there was not a soul in sight. i went directly across to the neighbors house. i felt i needed a second set of eyes on this odd sight. i rang the door bell and waited about a minute. i kept wanting to go back out to the street where i could see the lights and finally did when no one came to the door. back out in the street i looked north and the lights where gone. i though "great, "d" is going to come to the door and i am going to sound like a nut job" so i got on my bike and rode to the mail box. just to the left of the mail box is a walkway that enters the green zone. i walked out onto the sidewalk looking northwest and the sky was full of amber lights. i counted 16 of them and they appeared to be drifting eastward in no particular formation at less than 500 ft high and no more than a few miles distant, maybe 4 at the most. i could make out what appeared to be a large swept wing aircraft maneuvering around these drifting lights. i stood and watched them drift by and as they drifted behind the eucalyptus tree and emerged on the east side of the tree they where greatly dimmed. they could still be seen drifting but you really had to focus to follow them. i believe these where military flares and if so, why over residential housing? i think maybe they where intended to distract attention from whatever else was in the sky that night. i came home and immediately went on the internet to see if any such think was reported. i googled "ufos over phoenix" and landed on a webpage with exactly that title. i clicked the news link and to the left was a phone number so that a person could report sighting 24 hours a day. i called a number and a man answered. i said "i found the number on the web page and would like to report a sighting." i said " i was standing in the street and saw red lights to the north" and the phone wnet dead. i called back and only got a message telling me that i didn't have the authority to call that number. this happened repeatedly. this creaped me out so i went to bed. i later found out the the number i called was a pre-paid phone and his minutes ran out. that's my story.
content.summary: Multiple sightings within a 20 minute period. initially 25 to 40 stationary red light and them 16 drifting amber lights.

content.detailedDescription: About 8 pm on august 19th, travelling southbound on highway 79 approx. mile marker 120 or so, football sized rock, geode like grey/white exterior and black and crystal interior. hurled or fell from at least twice the height of truck from a 45 degree angle to truck north west bound and hit the truck door at 75 plus mph from side of road, fragmented into dust and left yellow sticky crystal residue that hardened into a wax like substance, when touched fresh residue, mica like crystal sparkles that slowly dissolved into my hand. left one tiny piece of shell in truck,  not sure if hurled from the field or fell from sky.  turned around to inspect area for remnants or life forms, only to be hit again by a smaller rock on the other side from the same area. stopped to see if any life forms were out there, heard three dogs chaotically barking, one seemed to be getting attacked. girlfriend and i were in complete shock the entire time.
content.summary: Ufo rock hit truck door and fragmented into dust, leaving yellow sticky crystal residue.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to smoke a cigarette late at night,and walked over to the west
side of the property to look at the stars,only to see a gigantic thing that i 
thought at first looked like a galaxy. it was stationary and was in the shape of a domed craft(the dome part was very tall). inside the the outline was what looked like a million stars. there was also wide bands of color around the thing like transparent-washy looking(red,blue and green). also a mist enveloped it(partially) and the mist was rotating slowly like around a planet. the countless lights that looked like twinkling stars didn't untwinkle. in the background you could make out a structure-city-like construct. i watched it for 5 minutes or so, went to get my camera, and the battery was dead(never happened before). the next night i had a friend over and we both went outside to smoke (we're both nightowls). i thought to myself-it's about the same time(after 1:00 am),i wonder if that thing is back. sure enough, there it was. i called him over to the same spot in between the cedars, and asked him-"what do you think of that?!!!" his reply was-"they're here!" we watched it for 5 or so minutes just floating there. couldn't tell how large it was(because it was so huge and not knowing how far away it was.)went to get the camera and remembered-the battery's dead. didn't charge it because i had no way of predicting it would return a second night. someone else had to see this. noone's talking or they never look up.Or just plain afraid. after processing this in my head a while, the only conclusion i came up with is-floating city (of sorts). the airport had to have a nervous breakdown. i wish i watched it for a longer period of time, but it was late and i\we were getting cold, and regretting having no camera.
content.summary: Object looked initially like a new gigantic galaxy with twinkling lights, color bands, and a mist that moved around it. shape of a domed giant floating city.

content.detailedDescription: I was in eastvale california. i just got off work at 12:30. i clocked out walked outside heard the noise of a propeller plane and i looked up to see it. that's when i saw a jetlike craft all white with no decals, it had 4 wings that wings that were angled forward with rods protruding off the ends. i stopped in the middle of the parking lot and watched it go west for about 2 minutes and then it was gone.
content.summary: Egg white color, jetlike, no decals, 4 wings angled forward, had no propeller but made the sound of one

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the lawn looking at the night sky as always and a bright white orb
floated in from the north about the altitude of a prop plane. no sound, no blinking or colorful lights. it started moving towards the east after a minute, stopped and hovered for a few seconds.I said in my mind-there you guys are. what are you up to again?(i see them quite a lot lately.Then it took off to the east, floating gradually faster, climbing slightly, and speeding up slowly, then disappeared.Clear night, no planes in the area. strange, because i see lots of them all over(this is a corridor and i'm on top of a mountain. i can see a large part of the sky, and it's rural, so there's not much light pollution.
content.summary: Object floated in from n, stopped and hovered momentarily,then traveled toward the east, climbed steadily and disappeared in seconds.
